resources.string:
2014.04.19:
 New features:
 · Support of opencaching.nl, opencaching.us, opencaching.ro
 · Changed initial coordinate format for waypoints to MinDec
 
 Bugfixing:
 · Improved long click detection in lists
 · Import from web does not work if started a second time
 · Reduce log picture preview size to avoid crashes on tablets
 · Fixed wrong arrow direction on live map and list in landscape mode
 · Fixed several possible crash scenarios
 
 
 Detailed list of all changes
 
 Old releases
 · Please refer to the release notes on the c:geo-website.
 
 
 Known Limitations/Bugs:
 · Live map:
 Approximated coords due to limitations on the GC-website
 Be aware: If navigation is started directly from live map it may also use the approximated coords!
 In fast mode the cache type might be wrong in rare cases
 On low zoom owned/found caches may not be hidden anymore
